title: Coordinate Simultaneous Operations (SIMOPS)
description: A terminal manager must coordinate two potentially conflicting activities: a tanker truck loading at one bay while a maintenance crew does hot work nearby.

tasks.description: Identify the two planned activities from the daily schedule and recognize them as a potential SIMOPS conflict.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system flags the two activities as a SIMOPS risk.

tasks.description: Review the SIMOPS matrix to determine the required mitigation measures (e.g., extra fire watch, exclusion zones).
tasks.expected_outcome: The required safety controls are identified from the company's procedures.

tasks.description: Issue a SIMOPS permit that details the required controls and ensure all parties involved sign off on it before work begins.
tasks.expected_outcome: A specific permit for the simultaneous operations is created and approved.
